Description: Slide (colour); a flowering pink acacia in the street; Cairo, Egypt 35mm slide, polyester
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Bryan A L Cranstone
Curator's comments: Bryan Cranstone's, British Museum fieldwork images, from an expedition in 1963 - 64. The title of this box of slides reads: "N.G.F. 1964, NEW GUINEA NATURAL HISTORY. MAPS. S.S. ORSOVA" Mount notes: this transparency was in a box with handwritten notes: "S.S. Orsova Cairo pink acacia 26/9/64". History: the S.S. Orsava was an ocean liner operated by the Orient Steam Navigation Company. This collection of slides relates to the prints in the BM collection Oc,B107 and B108.
Associated events: Associated Event: British Museum Expedition to Papua New Guinea 1963 - 1964
